Issue.creator: caveman7
Issue.summary: Service Discovery support for Implicit Collections
Issue.description: WARN 08c Failed computing collection principal sets for chaincode asset_transfer due to collection _implicit_org_Org1MSP doesn't exist in collection config for chaincode asset_transfer channel=channel1}} {{2020-07-16 08:03:29.632 UTC discovery chaincodeQuery -> ERRO 08d Failed constructing descriptor for chaincode chaincodes: ,: collection _implicit_org_Org1MSP doesn't exist in collection config for chaincode asset_transfer}} ``` I am sure that the collection exists in the my CouchDB world state >
